channel.title: [PI] Player cant move
channel.description:
Mkay so ive got it so that once a player kills this certain npc they get teled to a certain spot. How can i make it so that the player can move after being teled.
Ive looked for many methods cant find one. Ive tried looking at the ice barrage method cant find it.. :/ Please help.

item.title: [PI] Player cant move
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:4, topic:413819”]Add a timer or use an event… It would go into Walking.java like…

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.Teleport < HowLongYOUWANTTIMERTOBEHERE :O?) {
c.playerIndex = 0;
return;
}

Then, add where the teleport is being called
c.Teleport++;[/quote]

i fixed xD

c.freezeTimer = 99999;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Player cant move
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Add a timer or use an event… It would go into Walking.java like…

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.Teleport < HowLongYOUWANTTIMERTOBEHERE :O?) {
c.playerIndex = 0;
return;
}

Then, add where the teleport is being called
c.Teleport++;

Read full topic
